name: chess-pwa
description: Offline multiplayer chess PWA with SMS-based game sharing

scripts.start: echo 'Chess PWA will be available at: http://localhost:3458' && npm run dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Commit and push docs/ to deploy to GitHub Pages'
scripts.port: echo 'Chess PWA runs on port 3458 (see PORT_REGISTRY.md)'
scripts.port:kill: lsof -ti :3458 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process on port 3458'
scripts.port:force: npm run port:kill && npm run dev

author: Chase Pettet
